code: export var products=function products(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"PRODUCTS_RECEIVED":return state.concat(action.payload);case"PRODUCT_DELETED":return state.filter(function(product){return product._id!==action.payload;});case"PRODUCT_ADDED":return state.concat(action.payload);case"PRODUCT_UPDATED":return state.map(function(product){if(product._id===action.payload._id){return Object.assign({},action.payload);}else{return product;}});case"ADDED_TO_CART":return state.map(function(product){if(product._id===action.item.productId){var quantity=product.quantity===0?0:product.quantity-1;return Object.assign({},product,{quantity:quantity});}else{return product;}});default:return state;}};
